title: A few T206 Available inlcuding a Mattern Polar Bear
author: HeritageHoarder

posts.post_title: A few T206 Available inlcuding a Mattern Polar Bear
posts.post_content:
Hello All, Kind of new here, was referred by user BigDan502! He is a great guy!

These cards are in pretty solid shape, no paper loss, just a minor back crease on the Mattern as you can see in the photo.

Looking for offers!

Thank you!

Will also trade for PSA graded vintage.

PRICES REMOVED! Make an offer. Would love to clear these out. Thanks!

What is posted us still available?

Sent from my SAMSUNG-SM-G925A using Tapatalk

This lot is back available due to member jkray having issues apparently with payment.

Looking for $275 for the lot. 

Thank you.
